mapper.insert: insert into savealarm (pbno, cmd, gBoardWriter, m_id, ano) values (#{pbno}, #{cmd}, #{gboardwriter}, #{m_id}, seq_alarm.nextval)
mapper.select: select * from savealarm where gboardwriter = #{gboardwriter} and isread = 'N'
mapper.update: update savealarm set isread = 'Y' where ano = #{ano}
